categories.name: Mains
categories.description: Discover the heart and soul of Polish cuisine with our tantalizing selection of main dishes. Indulge in hearty stews and sizzling meats, all bursting with authentic flavors and served with a side of Polish hospitality. Each dish is thoughtfully crafted to bring you a truly memorable dining experience.

items.name: Bigos
items.description: A traditional Polish stew made with sauerkraut, meat, and a variety of vegetables.

items.name: Pierogi
items.description: Polish dumplings filled with potatoes, cheese, meat, or fruit.

items.name: Kotlet schabowy
items.description: Polish pork cutlet served with mashed potatoes and pickles.

items.name: Zapiekanka
items.description: A popular street food in Poland made with a baguette or bread topped with mushrooms, cheese, and other ingredients.

items.name: Kielbasa
items.description: Polish sausage typically made with pork, beef, or veal.

items.name: Golonka
items.description: Polish pork knuckle served with sauerkraut and potatoes.

categories.name: Sides
categories.description: Enhance your meal with our delectable array of side dishes, specially crafted to complement the flavors of our main courses. Each side dish is meticulously prepared using fresh, locally sourced ingredients to ensure a harmonious balance of taste and texture. Elevate your dining experience with these delightful accompaniments.

items.name: Kapusta
items.description: Polish-style sauerkraut.

items.name: Kopytka
items.description: Polish potato dumplings similar to Italian gnocchi.

items.name: Placki ziemniaczane
items.description: Polish potato pancakes.

items.name: Buraczki
items.description: Polish-style pickled beets.

items.name: Zupa ogórkowa
items.description: A traditional Polish soup made with pickled cucumbers and vegetables.

categories.name: Drinks
categories.description: Quench your thirst with our refreshing assortment of Polish-inspired drinks. From classic favorites to unique concoctions, our beverage menu offers something for everyone. Whether you're seeking a revitalizing non-alcoholic beverage or a spirited libation, our drinks menu is designed to complement your meal and elevate your dining experience.

items.name: Piwo
items.description: Polish beer.

items.name: Wódka
items.description: Polish vodka.

items.name: Kompot
items.description: A sweet drink made from boiled fruit.

items.name: Herbata
items.description: Polish tea.

items.name: Kawa
items.description: Polish coffee.

categories.name: Desserts
categories.description: Satisfy your sweet tooth with our irresistible selection of Polish desserts. Our dessert menu offers a symphony of flavors and textures, combining traditional recipes with modern twists. Each dessert is a work of art, crafted with passion and presented with elegance. Treat yourself to a divine ending to your meal and experience the sweet delights of Polish culinary craftsmanship.

items.name: Sernik
items.description: Polish-style cheesecake.

items.name: Pączki
items.description: Two Polish doughnuts filled with various sweet fillings, such as jam, custard, or chocolate.

items.name: Makowiec
items.description: Traditional Polish poppy seed roll. It consists of a sweet yeast dough filled with a mixture of ground poppy seeds, honey, and chopped nuts.

items.name: Kremówka
items.description: Polish dessert made of layers of crispy puff pastry filled with a rich vanilla or custard cream.
